p: Design-Expert Program 8.2 software was used to generate a factorial design experiment and ANOVA was conducted to determine the significance of the factors and their interactions. For multiple comparisons, one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) followed by post hoc Bonferroni’s test when comparing all pairs or Dunnett’s test when comparing pairs with control, with confidence degree 95% ( p < .05) (GraphPad Prism 7, La Jolla, CA). All data were expressed as the mean of three experiments ± SD.
